How can I change the radar display in Counter-Strike: Source?

[section style=note] [h3]Note:[/h3]The options below will require you to use the Developer's Console in the game - if you are not familiar with the Developer's Console you should read the article linked below to get started:

[url=https://help.steampowered.com/en/faqs/view/4700-D10E-26BE-DDDD]Console[/url][/section] [h4]Turn off radar in Counter-Strike: Source[/h4]If you would like to disable the radar, please enter the following command into the developer's console: [i]cl_radar_alpha 0[/i]

[h4]Radar display settings[/h4][list]     [*][i]cl_radar_locked #[/i] (where [i]#[/i] is [i]0[/i] or [i]1[/i]) - locks the angle of the radar screen (off or on)[/*]     [*][i]cl_radaralpha #[/i] (where [i]#[/i] is [i]0[/i] to [i]255[/i]) - sets transparency of radar display (transparent to opaque)[/*]     [*][i]drawradar[/i] - shows the location text under your radar screen[/*]     [*][i]hideradar[/i] - hides the location text under your radar screen[/*]     [*][i]overview_alpha #[/i] (where [i]#[/i] is [i]0[/i], [i]0.5[/i], or [i]1[/i]) - adjusts overview map translucency (transparent, semi-transparent, opaque)[/*]     [*][i]overview_health #[/i] (where [i]#[/i] is [i]0[/i] or [i]1[/i]) - shows player’s health in map overview (off or on)[/*]     [*][i]overview_locked #[/i] (where [i]#[/i] is [i]0[/i] or [i]1[/i]) - locks map angles so the map does not follow your point of view angle (off or on)[/*]     [*][i]overview_names #[/i] (where [i]#[/i] is [i]0[/i] or [i]1[/i]) - shows player’s name in map overview (off or on)[/*]     [*][i]overview_preferred_mode #[/i] (where [i]#[/i] is [i]0[/i], [i]1[/i], or [i]2[/i]) - determines preferred overview mode while in spectator mode (off, mini-map, full map)[/*]     [*][i]overview_tracks #[/i] (where [i]#[/i] is [i]0[/i] or [i]1[/i]) - shows player’s tracks in map overview (off or on)[/*] [/list]
title: Changing the radar and map displays in Counter-Strike: Source
